l:item.name: SLD
l:item.ofx:paragraph: This is the core object and describes a bunch of settings which can be applied to visualize data.

l:item.name: Type (SLD)
l:item.ofx:paragraph: categorizes the type of a SLD, the possible types are summarized in Table .

l:item.name: Template
l:item.ofx:paragraph: is a reference to a SLD style which is configured in the GeoServer

l:item.name: Rule
l:item.ofx:paragraph: is a individual rule applied for a specific setting

l:item.name: Style -- DEPRECATED
l:item.ofx:paragraph: will be interpreted as the geometry of the symbol. The available styles are summarized in Table .

l:item.name: Graphic
l:item.ofx:paragraph: The graphical representation is defined with the graphic. It's possible to directly use SVG as well as simple symbolizers (when defining the style, color and size).

l:item.name: Type (Graphic)
l:item.ofx:paragraph: categorizes the type of a SLD, the possible types are summarized in Table .
